description: The move to appeal to tech-native young investors has also drawn interest among seasoned users. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Boost in trading activity as Singapore brokers leverage AI to help investors pick stocks
title_page: Boost in trading activity as Singapore brokers leverage AI to help investors pick stocks | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Stock brokerages are leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) to pick and analyse stocks in an attempt to draw tech-native young investors. While doing so, they find they have an audience among more seasoned users as well.
One of those leading the charge is OCBC Securities, which in June launched A.I. Oscar, short for AI OCBC Securitiesâ€™ Customer Artificial Intelligence Radar.
